Params: {3: 'With a swift slash, Lucia smashes through the rooftop door and rushes onto the roof with her katana at her hip.'}
{3: 'Confirming that there are no Corrupted on the roof, Lucia turns and nods to other Gray Ravens in the corridor.'}
{3: 'Lee walks over and squats along the edge of the roof. He takes out four mechanical devices from his arms and fixes them onto the edge.'}
{3: 'Lucia sheaths her katana, then walks over to you.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Whether it be for acting on my own accord at HQ or for failing to make the right call just nowâ€”I failed my duty as captain.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I always have to rely on you to come save the day, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'As captain of the Gray Ravens, I should be able to lighten your burden.', 4: '1'}
{2: "No, you've only imposed that upon yourself.", 3: '26'}
{2: 'What matters most is that we fight for a common goal.', 3: '28'}
{2: 'While fighting for this goal, there are certain things only you are capable of doing, Lucia.', 3: '30'}
{2: 'You should also learn to accept your strengths.', 3: '33'}
{2: 'You really got us out of a pinch.', 3: '36'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'According to the scan, Corrupted are gathered in the factory on 39th Street.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Lee magnifies the street hologram in Liv's hand. Red dots representing Corrupted are gathered all throughout the area."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "In this situation, I'm afraid it's unrealistic to proceed directly with destroying the factory.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lee and I will split up to cover 35th Street and 42nd Street. Liv stay here with the commandant and provide long-ranged support.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'There are numerous factors we need to account for on the battlefield when devising an attack plan.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I think your assessment is right, Lee.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Liv doesn't excel in close-quarter combat. Not to mention, she exhausted her Levi-Gun while rescuing you from the pit. She should come around with the commandant at her side.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "No matter. It's equally important to own up to your strengths and weaknesses.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hearing this, Lee is lost in thought for a few moments before returning to his usual expression. Liv puts her hands to her chest and looks down in hesitation.'}
{3: 'Confirming the battle plan, Lee leaps off the right side of the roof.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I left rappelling gear and basic protective devices for the three of you on the roof. Use them as needed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Cut the chit-chat and get to work to prevent any further delay.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "(Nods). Lee doesn't always like to communicate, but his actions speak louder than words.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I wonder if I can be like Lee someday...', 4: '3'}
{2: "Don't force yourself to be like someone else.", 3: '89'}
{3: 'While you and Liv speak, Lucia proceeds to collect the equipment Lee left on the roof.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm going, too. Liv, Commandant, be careful.", 4: '1'}
